SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.meta
Annotation Type Author

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Author

Specifies an author of the given plugin. For example, to specify that a given plugin was written by John Doe, write:

@Author(name = "John Doe")
@PluginImplementation
public class ServiceImpl implements Service { ... }

This information can be queried using the PluginInformation plugin.

Author:
Ralf Biedert
See Also:
PluginInformation.Information

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String name
          Author of this plugin.
 

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
Author of this plugin.

Returns:
.
Default:
"Unknown Author"
